ruleset.name: Unused Code Rules (JavaTddPlugin version)
ruleset.description: Detects when a private field is declared and/or assigned a value, but not used. This version of the ruleset includes alternate messages from the main PMD rulesets/java/unusedcode.xml ruleset.

rule.message: The private field ''{0}'' is never used, so it appears to be unnecessary.
